title: My Amazing Event

description.intro: I'd love to invite you to my chaotic homewarming / punch party.
paragraphs: Do I have the slightest idea of how many people I can fit in my new flat or if there will be enough seating options? Yeah that's a hard no on both.
But to compensate for that, I also have no idea how to make good punch.

Anyway, I'm planning for a chill hang, and will try my best to keep Paul far away from any music choices so that it doesn't escalate in a conversation-drowning hard-style rave. (Yes Paul, this section is in every invite not just in yours.)

details.title: Drinks
details.text: There will be some basics, but bring what you like.
